titleStmt.title: The petition of both Houses of Parliament presented to His Majestie at York, March 26, 1642 : with His Majesties answer thereunto : and the petition of the noblemen and gentlemen estated in Ireland and now in London : and likewise the petition of the countie of Lincoln : with His Majesties severall and respective answers thereunto.
Humble petition and declaration of both Houses of Parliament to the Kings most excellent Majesty, sent to Yorke ... on the 23 of March 1642
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: The petition of both Houses of Parliament presented to His Majestie at York, March 26, 1642 : with His Majesties answer thereunto : and the petition of the noblemen and gentlemen estated in Ireland and now in London : and likewise the petition of the countie of Lincoln : with His Majesties severall and respective answers thereunto.
Humble petition and declaration of both Houses of Parliament to the Kings most excellent Majesty, sent to Yorke ... on the 23 of March 1642
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: The petition replies to His Majesties declaration to both Houses of Parliament, martii 21. 1641 [1642].

Also published with titles "Another declaration from both Houses of Parliament", "The humble petition and declaration of both Houses of Parliament" and "The humble petition of the Lords and Commons ... presented ... the 26. of March 1642".
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
